item.description:
There will be no June meeting. I am waiting to hear from Reading Public Library or whether we can have 2nd Tuesday of the month meetings in the future.

Stay tuned to meetup.com updates for a possible July 8th meeting.

BETSY
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.why: You'll love it because everyone here, while in pain and suffering, is dedicated to getting well and are proactive in that endeavor.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia Support Meeting
